      Methods in edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.method with parameters of type Metric 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void Method.iterateOnFiltersAndStoreResult(List<Filter> filters, WritableImage toProcess, Metric m)
      Runs through a sequence of Filters and applies them successively to an input image; quantifies images according to the supplied metric and the mask that results from application of the filters.

      class  AreaAndPerimeterMetric
      A metric that takes each region in a mask and calculates its area and perimeter.
      class  IntensityPerPixelMetric
      A simple Metric that quantifies the total intensity in a region of interest divided by the size of that region of interest.
